channel.title: Running Cheezscape
channel.description:
Alright I'll just get straight to the point. Moparscape works just fine when I hit "runMoparScape", however, I have just downloaded Cheezscape. I hit "runserver" and it says:
"Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 config/objects.cfg: file not found. Summoning: Loading monsters from summon.cfg... Summoning: Loaded 25 monsters from summon.cfg!"
And then it stops. I hit Compile:
"Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details Press any key to continue . . ."
And then I hit Run&Compile:
"The system cannot find the path specified. Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 config/objects.cfg: file not found. Summoning: Loading monsters from summon.cfg... Summoning: Loaded 25 monsters from summon.cfg!"
If you can assist me, that would be great.
Quite Frankly, this is starting to piss me off.
People who post here calling me a "noob", or rambling on about how this is a "noob post", or anything of that nature, will be ignored.
Thank-You.

item.title: Running Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @Papa_Smurf Papa Smurf
item.description:
@Papa_Smurf wrote:

Alright. So download a different version of Cheezscape?

Problems like this bug me. I can’t do anything else until this is solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @cowie cowie
item.description:
@cowie wrote:

meh on ur run and compile u might have a backslash or code not full so u cant compile it so it goes straight into run

u lost ur objest/item.cfg file or its not found

and ur compile is fine

item.title: Running Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @GoldMod GoldMod
item.description:
@GoldMod wrote:

Hve u tryed this ? right click compile go edit

and put this in … . . . .

here

echo off
COLOR 08
title YourServerName Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_08in/java.exe” server
pause

Program files u can change were u have youre latest java and

jdk1.5.0_08
jre1.5.0_08
u can change the 8 to what updater you got [br][size=1]Posted at: September 25, 2006, 10:13:02 AM[/size][hr]if youre swedish edit means / redigera

Read full topic

item.description:
@Papa_Smurf wrote:

after it says that it loaded the monsters of summoning skill,you can use your server…its not error or something.

item.title: Running Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @Papa_Smurf Papa Smurf
item.description:
@Papa_Smurf wrote:

Well you’re running everything twice… the path is already being used…

  1. Compile
  2. Run server, then you’re done.

Tried it. Says the same messages.

Read full topic
